body:
Comment 2: 
I was able to compile your source file with cgo under 4c468c07d05c tip linux/386 with 
no problems. Could you please update this issue with the full error message text?

You may also wish to try an "hg update release" and "./all.bash" in $GOROOT/src, and 
see if that alleviates the problem (as merely another data point for diagnosing the
issue; 
it should be working at the revision you're using anyway).
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
